description: The Google Pixel 10 series has finally been launched in India and the global markets. Google took the wraps off its latest smartphone series at the Made by Google event held in New York on August 20. As part of its latest flagship smartphone lineup, the tech giant has introduced four models — Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Here is your complete guide to the new Pixel 10 series.
title: Google Pixel 10 Price in India: Your Complete Guide to the New Pixel 10 Series

description: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL handsets. The Pixel 10 features a 6.3-inch full-HD+ 120Hz display, Tensor G5 SoC, Android 16, a 48-megapixel triple rear camera setup and a 10.5-megapixel selfie shooter. It packs a 4,970mAh battery with 30W charging and Qi2 wireless charging support. The Pro models add larger LTPO displays, 16GB RAM, 50-megapixel main cameras, 42-megapixel front cameras, and bigger batteries.
title: Google Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL Launched in India With Tensor G5 SoC, Gemini-Powered Camera Coach Feature

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold was launched at the Made by Google event on Wednesday. The latest book-style foldable smartphone from the tech giant sports a 6.4-inch OLED cover screen and an 8.0-inch main OLED display. It is powered by a 3nm Tensor G5 processor and the Tensor M2 security chip. There is a triple rear camera system, headlined by a 48-megapixel primary sensor, on the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The foldable handset packs a 5,015mAh battery with both wired and wireless charging support.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Launched With Tensor G5 Chip, 8-Inch Super Actua Flex Display: Price, Specifications

description: Google Pixel Buds 2a were launched in India alongside the Pixel 10 series and a new colourway for the Pixel Buds Pro 2. The Pixel Buds 2a feature 11mm dynamic drivers and Google’s Tensor A1 chip, and they offer support for adaptive ANC with Transparency Mode, Silent Seal 1.5, and in-ear pressure relief. They support Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity and feature dual microphones, capacitive touch controls, and charge via a USB Type-C port. The earbuds are said to offer a total battery life of up to 27 hours with the case.
title: Google Pixel Buds 2a Launched in India Alongside New Pixel Buds Pro 2 Colourway

description: Google Pixel Watch 4 was launched at the Made by Google event on Wednesday. It has been introduced in two sizes and sports a design similar to the Pixel Watch 3. As per Google, the Pixel Watch 4 provides quick access to the Gemini. There is support for more than 40 exercise modes, along with Loss of Pulse detection and other health features. The smartwatch can deliver up to 40 hours of battery life on a single charge.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Launched in India With Actua 360 Always-On Display, Up to 40 Hour Battery Life: Price, Specifications

description: Gamescom Opening Night Live brought a host of new game reveals, announcements, trailers, and more. From Lords of the Fallen 2 and a new game from Disco Elysium developer ZA/UM to a new Lego Batman game and Sekiro anime. Here are all the major announcements from the show.
title: Black Myth: Zhong Kui, Lords of the Fallen 2, More: All Major Announcements From Gamescom Opening Night Live

description: Flipkart Super Value Week is currently live, offering top discounts on smartphones from various brands, like Apple, Samsung, Google, Oppo, Realme, and others. The e-commerce platform is providing exchange offers and instant bank discounts on credit and debit cards of select banks. Interested buyers can grab a new phone at a relatively low price till the sale event is live.
title: Flipkart Super Value Week: Top Deals on iPhone 16, Google Pixel 9, Samsung Galaxy S24, and More Phones

description: Lava Play Ultra 5G has been launched in India on Wednesday. It has a 6.67-inch full-HD+ AMOLED display and runs on a 4nm MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chipset alongside up to 8GB RAM and 128GB storage. It has an IP64-rated build for dust and water resistance.
title: Lava Play Ultra 5G With 5,000mAh Battery, MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Chipset Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Reliance Jio has seemingly removed its Rs. 799 recharge plan in India, making its Rs. 889 prepaid plan the cheapest one that offers 1.5GB data per day and 84 days of validity. This comes soon after Airtel also discontinued its Rs. 249 recharge plan, hiking its price to Rs. 299. This hints at an industry-wide trend where telecom service providers have been removing the value-for-money recharge plans.
title: Reliance Jio Reportedly Discontinues Rs. 799 Recharge Plan in India With 1.5GB Daily Data Usage, 84 Days Validity

description: Bitcoin slipped to around $113,638 on Wednesday, August 20, while Ether traded near $4,176 as the crypto market cooled after recent highs. Analysts said ETF outflows, Trump’s tariffs on metals, and weak investor sentiment have triggered risk-off moves, with fear dominating short-term behaviour. Altcoins also faced pressure, though whale accumulation and institutional interest suggest September could become a turning point.
title: Bitcoin Nears $113,500 as ETFs See Outflows, Ether Holds $4,100

description: OnePlus may soon start the OxygenOS 16 Beta programme for the OnePlus Nord 4. The option to apply for the Closed Beta has allegedly appeared in the phone's update section after the August 2025 security patch update. The open beta of the  OxygenOS 16 could start rolling out in October.
title: OnePlus May Soon Begin OxygenOS 16 Beta Programme for the OnePlus Nord 4

description: Perplexity has added a new finance tool to its artificial intelligence (AI) search platform. Announced on Wednesday, the new feature now shows price alerts for the movement of Indian stocks. The new feature allows users to set a target price or movement percentage for a particular stock, and then the AI system automatically tracks it.
title: Perplexity Introduces Indian Stock Price Alerts Feature as Platform Crosses 300 Million Weekly Queries

description: Artificial intelligence (AI) could permanently displace jobs, expressed two-thirds of adult US individuals who participated in a recent survey. The survey results also highlight that participants are worried that the technology can be used to stir up political chaos, and could even risk the future of humans. After generative AI first arrived on the scene in late 2022, many raised concerns that ranged from the rise of misinformation to the complete collapse of human societies.
title: AI Can Permanently Take Away Jobs and Cause Political Chaos, Say US Citizens: Report

description: Google Pixel 10 series is set to debut today (August 20). Ahead of its imminent launch, the phone’s advertisement for the French market has leaked online. The upcoming lineup might feature four smartphones - the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The standard Pixel 10 will reportedly be powered by a Tensor G5 chipset, coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series  Ad Leaked Hours Ahead of Official Launch

description: The Honor Magic 8 series is expected to debut in black, cyan, white, and titanium gold colourways. The phones are expected to include a periscope telephoto camera, an ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor, and wireless charging. Display sizes may range from 6.3 to 6.7 inches, with two models expected to launch in October 2025 and the Mini and Ultra variants likely to arrive in early 2026.
title: Honor Magic 8 Series Colour Options Leaked; Expected to Include Two New Shades

description: Milagrow has launched the BlackCat 25 Ultra in India, its latest robotic vacuum-mop combo. It features a BLDC motor with up to 12,000Pa suction power and a LiDAR sensor for quicker mapping. The robot offers up to 120 minutes of runtime per charge and includes a 3-litre bagless dustbin, which Milagrow says provides up to 70 days of hands-free cleaning.
title: Milagrow BlackCat 25 Ultra Robot Vacuum-Mop With Up to 12,000Pa Suction Power Launched in India

description: The Realme P4 Pro has been launched in India. The latest smartphone comes with a dual-tone design language. The device features a dedicated Hyper Vision AI chip that is said to enhance the visual experience. Moreover, the smartphone is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 processor and packs a massive 7,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging support. Check out the Realme P4 Pro first impressions to know more about the device.
title: Realme P4 Pro 5G First Impressions

description: Black Myth: Wukong developer Game Science announced Black Myth: Zhong Kui, a sequel to the popular action-RPG, at Gamescom Opening Night Live on Tuesday. The new Black Myth game is still in early development, with no confirmed release date yet.
title: Black Myth: Zhong Kui, Sequel to Black Myth: Wukong, Announced at Gamescom Opening Night Live

description: Google Pixel 10 series is set to debut at today's Made by Google event, bringing significant upgrades. Alongside the Pixel 10 smartphones, Google is also expected to reveal the Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a. You can follow the Google Pixel 10 Series Launch live updates from the launch event on Gadgets 360.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Launch LIVE: Google Expected to Launch Pixel 10 Lineup, Pixel Watch 4, Pixel Buds 2a and More

description: Google Pixel 10 series will be launched in India and global markets today (August 20). Ahead of its debut, the Pixel 10's availability has been teased on Flipkart, suggesting that it may be one of the channels through which it will be sold in India. The phone will be listed on the e-commerce platform today at 9:30 pm IST, and pre-orders for the Pixel 10 will begin tomorrow (August 21).
title: Google Pixel 10 will be Available on Flipkart Ahead of Made by Google Event Today

description: HMD Fuse was launched in the global markets on Wednesday. The handset comes with a 6.56-inch HD+ 90Hz display. It is powered by Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chipset, coupled with 6GB of RAM. Among the highlights is a suite of parental control features dubbed HarmBlock+. As per the company, it can be used to designate safe zones, whitelist contacts, and enable app access restrictions. The HMD Fuse packs a 5,000mAh battery with 33W charging support.
title: HMD Fuse With HarmBlock+ Parental Control Features Launched: Price, Specifications

description: The Pixel 10 series is all set to go official later today. Google is expected to maintain steady pricing for the new Pixel family, with changes primarily tied to storage configurations rather than actual price hikes. Let's quickly compare the leaked pricing of the Pixel 10 series with the Pixel 9 series.
title: How Much Will the Pixel 10 Series Cost? Leaked Prices Show No Hike Over Pixel 9

description: Meta is reportedly restructuring its artificial intelligence (AI) division again, after recently establishing the Superintelligence Labs. As per the report, the new reorganisation will divide the division into four specialised groups, with each tasked with developing a specific area. Alongside the restructuring, the Menlo Park-based tech giant is reportedly also planning to downsize the division, which is said to have grown to thousands of employees.
title: Meta Is Reportedly Restructuring Its AI Division Again to Create Four Specialised Groups

description: Vivo has confirmed the launch of the T4 Pro 5G in India on August 26 at noon. It will be priced between Rs. 25,000 and Rs. 30,000 and be available via Flipkart. The phone will feature a 50-megapixel Sony IMX882 telephoto camera with 3x zoom, a quad-curved AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset, and a 6,500mAh battery.
title: Vivo T4 Pro 5G India Launch Date Set for August 26; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: Workday, the HR solutions company, was recently attacked by threat actors. The company said that "some" information was compromised. However, the customer data was largely safe. Recently, hackers have been targeting tech firms to steal information.
title: Workday Targeted By Hackers To Run Social Engineering Scams; “Some” Data Leaked

description: Ayn Thor’s launch has been confirmed by the Chinese handheld maker. The firm revealed that the device could debut soon, along with a promotional video that reveals its design. Moreover, the company has also announced that it will unveil the Odin 3 soon after the debut of the AYN Thor. Currently, little is known about the two handhelds, apart from the screen size of Ayn Thor.
title: Ayn Thor To Debut Soon As a Dual-Screen Gaming Handheld; Odin 3’s Launch To Follow

description: Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) rolls out redeem codes at regular intervals. The redeem codes help the gaming community to get new skins, uniforms, UC, and more for free. More importantly, the redeem codes are released regularly by the brand. Check out the list of new BGMI redeem codes through which you can get free items.
title: BGMI Redeem Codes: How to Claim Red Football Uniform, Free Rewards, Skins, UC, and More

description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 was fully revealed at Gamescom Opening Night Live on Tuesday. The shooter will launch across PC and consoles on November 14. Pre-orders for Black Ops 7 are now live.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Reveal Confirms Co-Op Campaign, Launch Set for November 14

description: The Xiaomi 16 series is expected to arrive later this year. While previous iterations have featured three models in the lineup, the brand has been rumoured to shake things up with the inclusion of a fourth model as well. According to a tipster’s claims on social media, a compact version of the purported Xiaomi 16 Pro is also in the works, and it could debut with a 6.3-inch display, a periscope telephoto camera, and a 6,300mAh battery.
title: Compact Xiaomi 16 Pro Tipped to Come With a 6.3-inch Display, Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: Google Pixel 10 series is scheduled to debut today (August 20), along with the tech giant’s new smartwatches and true wireless stereo (TWS). Ahead of the much-anticipated launch event, the prices of the upcoming devices have leaked online, suggesting the possible storage variants, too. While the standard Pixel 10 is tipped to be offered in two storage variants, the Pixel 10 Pro could come in four storage models.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series, Pixel Watch 4 Prices Leaked Again Ahead of Today's Launch

description: The Indian government has reportedly drafted a Bill seeking to regulate the online gaming space. As per the report, the draft Bill adopts a two-pronged approach, encouraging and establishing a regulatory framework for e-sports while prohibiting advertising of real-money games (RMGs). It is said to also outline punishments for betting in an e-sport tournament or other such competitive games, either online or via offline channels.
title: Government Reportedly Drafts Online Gaming Bill to Regulate e-Sports: 5 Things to Know

description: HP Omen 16 (2025) has been launched in India. The new gaming laptop features a 16-inch display with a 240Hz refresh rate and an 83Wh battery. It supports up to Intel Core Ultra CPU and up to AMD Ryzen AI processors. It features up to an Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 Ti laptop GPU with 12GB of dedicated graphics memory.
title: HP Omen 16 (2025 ) Gaming Laptop With 240Hz Display, Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 Ti GPU Launched in India

description: Meta is rolling out the voice translation feature to Facebook and Instagram users globally. The Meta AI Translations feature allows creators to translate content into other languages so a broader audience can view it. At launch, the Meta AI translations are limited to select languages. The feature uses generative AI to translate voice, with optional lip-syncing. Translated reels will be shown to viewers in their preferred language, and they will be able to see that your reel was translated with Meta AI.
title: Instagram, Facebook Creators Can Now Use Meta AI Translations to Dub and Lip-Sync Reels

description: Realme has launched the P4 series in India, featuring the P4 5G and P4 Pro 5G. Both phones include 50-megapixel AI cameras, 7,000mAh batteries with 80W charging, and Hyper Vision chipsets. The base Realme P4 5G uses a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, while the Pro variant has a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset. Prices start at Rs. 18,499 for the vanilla Realme P4 5G and Rs. 24,999 for the Pro model. Buyers can avail discounts, exchange offers, and EMI options.
title: Realme P4 Pro 5G Launched in India Alongside Realme P4 5G With 7,000mAh Battery

description: Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC has been unveiled and the new chip is built on a 4nm process technology, with a 1+3+4 Kryo CPU design. The new chip will boost the prime core to 2.7GHz and promises a seven percent improvement in both CPU and GPU performance. The chip supports 2,900×1,300 displays at 144Hz, up to 200-megapixel cameras, and 4K HDR10/HDR10+ video recording.
title: Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC Launched With Up to 7 Percent Improved CPU Performance

description: Meta Platforms has been rumoured to be working on a new pair of smart glasses as the successor to the Ray-Ban Meta Glasses for some time now. While they were previously thought to carry an exorbitant price tag, the tech giant’s strategy seems to have changed. As per a report, Meta will price its purported smart glasses, dubbed Hypernova, beginning at $800 (roughly Rs. 70,000), following its decision to accept lower margins at launch.
title: Meta Hypernova Smart Glasses Will Reportedly Be Priced at $800; Launch Set for September

description: Bharti Airtel on Wednesday discontinued one of its popular prepaid recharge plans in India. Priced at Rs. 249, it was the telecom operator’s entry-level recharge pack, offering Airtel prepaid users daily high-speed internet, unlimited calls, 100 SMS messages per day, and more. They will now have to recharge with a slightly higher-priced plan to continue to enjoy similar benefits.
title: Airtel Discontinues Rs. 249 Prepaid Recharge Plan Which Offered 1GB Daily Data, 24-Day Validity

description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman reportedly admitted last week that the ongoing excitement around the generative artificial intelligence (AI) technology resembles the 1990s dot-com bubble. As per the report, Altman made the comments during an interview with a group of journalists, and highlighted that investors funding AI startups at high valuations could get “burned” in the future.
title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Compares AI Hype to Dot-Com Bubble, Warns ‘Someone’s Gonna Get Burned’: Report

description: The Made by Google event will take place later today (August 20). It is the company’s annual hardware launch event where the tech giant is expected to unveil its next-generation flagship smartphones, ubiquitously known as the Pixel 10 series. Apart from this, reports also hint towards the launch of Pixel Watch 4 and Pixel Buds 2a. Ahead of the launch, Google has begun teasing the design of two of its handsets, while leaks have also given us an idea of what to expect in terms of features and specifications from all of the upcoming products.
title: Google Pixel 10 Series Launch Event Today: How to Watch Livestream, Expected Announcements
